entry.title: Frustrated Kiwis should remember that nowhere else was Covid-free as long as NZ: Jacinda Ardern

media:group.media:title: Frustrated Kiwis should remember that nowhere else was Covid-free as long as NZ: Jacinda Ardern
media:group.media:description: The Prime Minister said it wouldn’t necessarily be our new normal to react to waves of coronavirus with additional lockdowns. Join Hilary Barry, Jeremy Wells and the team for a fresh perspective on today’s stories.
